text: وَجَآءَ إِخْوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And the brothers of Joseph came [seeking food], and they entered upon him; and he recognized them, but he was to them unknown.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan saudara-saudara Yusuf datang (ke Mesir} lalu mereka masuk ke (tempat)nya. Maka Yusuf mengenal mereka, sedang mereka tidak kenal (lagi) kepadanya.
